targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  toDate(usage_start_ts) AS date,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_ec2_cost,
  min(usage_start_ts) as min_ts,
  max(usage_start_ts) as max_ts
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='AWS EC2 Cost Analytics', user='1' */
SELECT
  toDate(usage_start_ts) AS date,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_ec2_cost,
  min(usage_start_ts) as min_ts,
  max(usage_start_ts) as max_ts
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDate(usage_start_ts) AS time,
  account_name AS metric,
  SUM(cost_blended) AS _
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY
  time,
  metric
ORDER BY
  time

panels.description: EC2 cost on the basis of account ids

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  account_id,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_cost
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
GROUP BY account_id
ORDER BY total_cost DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='AWS EC2 Cost Analytics', user='1' */
SELECT
  account_id,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_cost
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
GROUP BY account_id
ORDER BY total_cost DESC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  concat('Account Name: ', account_name) AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS value
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY account_name, metric
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.description: EC2 cost on the basis of Availability Zones

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  availability_zone AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_cost
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND trimBoth(availability_zone) != ''
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY total_cost DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='AWS EC2 Cost Analytics', user='1' */
SELECT
  availability_zone AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_cost
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND trimBoth(availability_zone) != ''
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY total_cost DESC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  availability_zone AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS total_cost
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND trimBoth(availability_zone) != ''
  AND $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY total_cost DESC

panels.title: Availability Zones

panels.description: Daily trends in cost based on instance usage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(usage_start_ts) AS time,
  instance_type AS metric,
  COUNT(resource_id) AS value
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND instance_type != ''
  AND $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Daily EC2 Instance Type Cost Breakdown

panels.description: Daily trends in cost based on instance usage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(usage_start_ts) AS time,
  autoscaling_group_name AS metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT resource_id) AS _ 
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND scaling_type = 'ASG'
  AND $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY time, autoscaling_group_name
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: EC2 ASG Instance by Type

panels.description: Daily trends in cost based on instance usage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfHour(usage_start_ts) AS time,
  instance_type AS metric,
  COUNT(resource_id) AS value
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND instance_type != ''
  AND scaling_type = 'Static'
  AND $__timeFilter(usage_start_ts)
  AND account_name IS NOT NULL
  AND (
    'All' IN (${account_name}) OR account_name IN (${account_name})
  )
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time ASC;

FROM cost.service_costs

panels.title: Pricing Model

panels.description: EC2 Instance Cost on Basis of Spot pricing model

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  trimBoth(instance_type) AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS value
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND trimBoth(pricing_model) = 'Spot'
  AND trimBoth(instance_type) != ''
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='AWS EC2 Cost Analytics', user='1' */

  trimBoth(instance_type) AS metric,
  round(sum(cost_blended), 2) AS value
FROM cost.service_costs
WHERE product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND trimBoth(pricing_model) = 'Spot'
  AND trimBoth(instance_type) != ''
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.title: Instance Cost on Basis of On Demand

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  account_name as __text,
  account_name as __value
FROM cost.service_costs 
WHERE account_name IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY account_name;
list.label: Account Name
list.name: account_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  account_name as __text,
  account_name as __value
FROM cost.service_costs 
WHERE account_name IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY account_name;
